mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, SDITM_ID, SDITM_LNM, SDITM_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_RMK, VRF_CD, DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, INFOTP_ID, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, INFOTP_LNM, INFOTP_CHG_YN, ENC_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, TEST_DATA_CNV_YN, STND_ASRT, PERS_INFO_CNV_YN, PERS_INFO_GRD

RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, SDITM_ID, SDITM_LNM, SDITM_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, RQST_DCD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_RMK, VRF_CD, DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, INFOTP_ID, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, INFOTP_LNM, INFOTP_CHG_YN, ENC_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, TEST_DATA_CNV_YN, STND_ASRT, PERS_INFO_CNV_YN, PERS_INFO_GRD
mapper.select: SELECT /* WaqSditmMapper.selectPersCode */ A.* , B.comm_dtl_cd AS CODE_CD , B.comm_dtl_cd_nm AS CODE_LNM , SUBSTR(B.OBJ_DESCN,0,INSTR(B.OBJ_DESCN,'|',1,1)-1) AS DTL_OBJ_DESCN , SUBSTR(B.OBJ_DESCN,INSTR(B.OBJ_DESCN,'|',1,1)+1) AS DTL_OBJ_DESCN2 , C.comm_dtl_cd AS UP_CODE_CD FROM WAA_COMM_DCD A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_COMM_DTL_CD B ON A.COMM_DCD_ID = B.COMM_DCD_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_COMM_DTL_CD C ON B.UPP_COMM_DTL_CD_ID = C.COMM_DTL_CD_ID AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE 1=1 AND COMM_DCD='PERS_INFO_GRD' AND A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY A.COMM_DCD_ID, B.DISP_ORD

SELECT /* WaqSditmMapper.selectStndItemRqstDetail */ A.* ,G.UPP_DMNG_ID ,G.UPP_DMNG_LNM FROM WAQ_SDITM A LEFT OUTER JOIN V_WAA_DMNG G ON A.DMNG_LNM = G.DMNG_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = G.STND_ASRT LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE B ON A.INFOTP_LNM = B.INFOTP_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DMNG_INFOTP_MAP C ON B.INFOTP_ID = C.INFOTP_ID AND B.STND_ASRT = C.STND_ASRT AND G.DMNG_ID = C.DMNG_ID AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DMNG D ON C.DMNG_ID = D.DMNG_ID AND C.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT /* WaqSditmMapper.selectItemRqstListbyMst */ A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO , A.SDITM_ID, A.SDITM_LNM, A.SDITM_PNM , A.LNM_CRI_DS, A.PNM_CRI_DS , A.RQST_DCD, A.RVW_CONTS, A.VRF_RMK, A.VRF_CD , A.DMNG_LNM , A.DMN_ID, A.DMN_LNM, A.DMN_PNM , A.INFOTP_ID , A.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN, A.DATA_SCAL , A.INFOTP_LNM, A.INFOTP_CHG_YN, IFNULL(B.ENC_YN,IFNULL(C.ENC_YN,'N')) AS ENC_YN , A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID, A.TEST_DATA_CNV_YN
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' ELSE CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '5' THEN '#0000FF' END END AS FontColor , GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM , A.STND_ASRT, A.PERS_INFO_CNV_YN, A.PERS_INFO_GRD , D.DMNG_ID FROM WAQ_SDITM A LEFT JOIN WAM_DMN B ON A.DMN_LNM = B.DMN_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT LEFT JOIN WAQ_DMN C ON C.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND C.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND C.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND C.VRF_CD = '1' AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT JOIN WAA_DMNG D ON D.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT
AND D.DMNG_ID = A.DMNG_ID AND D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31','%Y-%m-%d') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO

SELECT /* WaqSditmMapper.selectwamlist */ IFNULL((SELECT MAX(X.RQST_SNO) FROM WAQ_SDITM X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{reqmst.rqstNo} ), 0) + @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RQST_SNO , 'I' AS IBS_STATUS , A.SDITM_ID, A.SDITM_LNM, A.SDITM_PNM, A.LNM_CRI_DS, A.PNM_CRI_DS , #{reqmst.rqstDcd} AS RQST_DCD , D.DMNG_LNM , A.DMN_ID, B.DMN_LNM, B.DMN_PNM , A.INFOTP_ID, C.DATA_TYPE, C.DATA_LEN, C.DATA_SCAL, C.INFOTP_LNM, A.INFOTP_CHG_YN, A.ENC_YN , A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.TEST_DATA_CNV_YN , A.STND_ASRT, A.PERS_INFO_CNV_YN, A.PERS_INFO_GRD FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP, WAM_SDITM A INNER JOIN WAM_DMN B ON A.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT LEFT JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE C ON C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND C.INFOTP_ID = A.INFOTP_ID AND C.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT LEFT JOIN WAA_DMNG D ON D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND D.DMNG_ID = A.DMNG_ID AND D.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT WHERE (A.SDITM_ID,A.STND_ASRT) IN
(#{item.sditmId},#{item.stndAsrt})
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
SELECT /* WaqSditmMapper.selectExistsItemCheck */ SDITM_ID FROM WAQ_SDITM WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND VRF_CD = '1' LIMIT 0,1
mapper.insert: insert /* WaqSditmMapper.insert */ into WAQ_SDITM (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, SDITM_ID, SDITM_LNM, SDITM_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_RMK, VRF_CD, DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, INFOTP_ID, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, INFOTP_LNM, INFOTP_CHG_YN, ENC_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID,TEST_DATA_CNV_YN) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sditmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{infotpLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infotpChgYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testDataCnvYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_SDITM WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}

INSERT /* WaqSditmMapper.insertByDmnSno */ INTO WAQ_SDITM (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, SDITM_LNM, SDITM_PNM, RQST_DCD, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM , INFOTP_ID, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, INFOTP_LNM, INFOTP_CHG_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID,ENC_YN , STND_ASRT ) SELECT A.RQST_NO, IFNULL((SELECT MAX(X.RQST_SNO) FROM WAQ_SDITM X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ), 0) + @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RQST_SNO
,A.DMN_LNM, A.DMN_PNM, A.RQST_DCD, A.DMN_LNM, A.DMN_PNM, A.INFOTP_ID, A.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN, A.DATA_SCAL, A.INFOTP_LNM ,'N',A.OBJ_DESCN, 1 , A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID,A.ENC_YN , A.STND_ASRT FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP, WAQ_DMN A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_SDITM B WHERE A.DMN_LNM = B.SDITM_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO)

INSERT /* WaqSditmMapper.insertByDmnSno2 */ INTO WAQ_SDITM ( RQST_NO, RQST_SNO , SDITM_LNM, SDITM_PNM , RQST_DCD , DMNG_LNM , DMN_LNM , DMN_PNM , INFOTP_ID , INFOTP_LNM , DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN , DATA_SCAL , INFOTP_CHG_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID,ENC_YN,RVW_STS_CD,RVW_CONTS,VRF_CD, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID , LNM_CRI_DS , PNM_CRI_DS , STND_ASRT ) SELECT A.RQST_NO, IFNULL((SELECT MAX(X.RQST_SNO) FROM WAQ_SDITM X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ), 0) + @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RQST_SNO , A.DMN_LNM , A.DMN_PNM , A.RQST_DCD , A.DMNG_LNM , A.DMN_LNM , A.DMN_PNM , A.INFOTP_ID , A.INFOTP_LNM , A.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN, A.DATA_SCAL , 'N' , A.OBJ_DESCN , 1 , IFNULL((SELECT 'U' FROM WAM_SDITM SD WHERE A.DMN_ID = SD.DMN_ID AND A.DMN_LNM = SD.SDITM_LNM),'C') AS REG_TYP_CD , A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID,IFNULL(A.ENC_YN,'N') AS ENC_YN,A.RVW_STS_CD,A.RVW_CONTS,VRF_CD, NOW(), '자동생성' , '' AS LNM_CRI_DS , '' AS PNM_CRI_DS , A.STND_ASRT FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP, WAQ_DMN A INNER JOIN WAQ_MSTR B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN = 'Y' AND A.RVW_STS_CD ='1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_SDITM B WHERE B.SDITM_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.VRF_CD = '1' )

INSERT /* WaqSditmMapper.insertByCodeDmnSno2 */ INTO WAQ_SDITM ( RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , SDITM_LNM , SDITM_PNM , RQST_DCD , DMNG_LNM , DMN_LNM , DMN_PNM , INFOTP_ID , INFOTP_LNM , DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN , DATA_SCAL , INFOTP_CHG_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID,ENC_YN , RVW_STS_CD,RVW_CONTS , VRF_CD , APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID , LNM_CRI_DS , PNM_CRI_DS , STND_ASRT ) SELECT A.RQST_NO ,IFNULL((SELECT MAX(X.RQST_SNO) FROM WAQ_SDITM X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ), 0) + @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RQST_SNO , IFNULL(C.SDITM_LNM,A.DMN_LNM) AS SDITM_LNM , IFNULL(C.SDITM_PNM,A.DMN_PNM) AS SDITM_PNM , A.RQST_DCD , A.DMNG_LNM , A.DMN_LNM , A.DMN_PNM , A.INFOTP_ID , A.INFOTP_LNM , D.DATA_TYPE, D.DATA_LEN, D.DATA_SCAL , 'N' , IFNULL(C.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_DESCN) AS OBJ_DESCN , 1 , (CASE WHEN C.SDITM_ID IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END) AS REG_TYP_CD , A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID , IFNULL(A.ENC_YN,'N') AS ENC_YN , A.RVW_STS_CD , A.RVW_CONTS , A.VRF_CD , NOW() , '자동생성' , C.LNM_CRI_DS AS LNM_CRI_DS , C.PNM_CRI_DS AS PNM_CRI_DS , A.STND_ASRT FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP, WAQ_DMN A INNER JOIN WAQ_MSTR B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO LEFT JOIN WAM_SDITM C ON C.DMN_ID = A.DMN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE D ON A.INFOTP_ID = D.INFOTP_ID AND D.EXP_DTM = '99991231' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- AND A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN = 'Y' AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('U') AND A.DMNG_LNM LIKE '%코드' AND A.INFOTP_ID != C.INFOTP_ID -- 코드도메인인포타입 변경시만 생성 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_SDITM B WHERE B.SDITM_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.VRF_CD = '1' )

INSERT /* WaqSditmMapper.insertByCodeDmnSno3 */ INTO WAQ_SDITM ( RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , SDITM_LNM , SDITM_PNM , RQST_DCD , DMNG_LNM , DMN_LNM , DMN_PNM , INFOTP_ID , INFOTP_LNM , DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN , DATA_SCAL , INFOTP_CHG_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID,ENC_YN , RVW_STS_CD,RVW_CONTS , VRF_CD , APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID , LNM_CRI_DS , PNM_CRI_DS , STND_ASRT ) SELECT A.RQST_NO ,IFNULL((SELECT MAX(X.RQST_SNO) FROM WAQ_SDITM X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ), 0) + @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RQST_SNO , IFNULL(C.SDITM_LNM,A.DMN_LNM) AS SDITM_LNM , IFNULL(C.SDITM_PNM,A.DMN_PNM) AS SDITM_PNM , A.RQST_DCD , A.DMNG_LNM , A.DMN_LNM , A.DMN_PNM , A.INFOTP_ID , A.INFOTP_LNM , E.DATA_TYPE, E.DATA_LEN, E.DATA_SCAL , 'N' , IFNULL(C.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_DESCN) AS OBJ_DESCN , 1 , (CASE WHEN C.SDITM_ID IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END) AS REG_TYP_CD , A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID , IFNULL(A.ENC_YN,'N') AS ENC_YN , A.RVW_STS_CD , A.RVW_CONTS , A.VRF_CD , NOW() , '변경생성' , C.LNM_CRI_DS AS LNM_CRI_DS , C.PNM_CRI_DS AS PNM_CRI_DS , A.STND_ASRT FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP, WAQ_DMN A INNER JOIN WAQ_MSTR B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO INNER JOIN WAH_DMN D ON A.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID AND A.OBJ_VERS - 1 = D.OBJ_VERS AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT INNER JOIN WAM_SDITM C ON C.DMN_ID = A.DMN_ID AND C.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE E ON A.INFOTP_ID = E.INFOTP_ID AND E.EXP_DTM = '99991231' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('U') AND A.INFOTP_ID != C.INFOTP_ID AND C.INFOTP_ID = D.INFOTP_ID AND A.DMNG_LNM NOT LIKE '%코드' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_SDITM B WHERE B.SDITM_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.VRF_CD = '1' )
mapper.update:
update /* WaqSditmMapper.updateByPrimaryKeySelective */ WAQ_SDITM
SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SDITM_LNM = #{sditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SDITM_PNM = #{sditmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LNM_CRI_DS = #{lnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PNM_CRI_DS = #{pnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_PNM = #{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMNG_ID = #{dmngId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMNG_LNM = #{dmngLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFOTP_ID = #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INFOTP_LNM = #{infotpLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFOTP_CHG_YN = #{infotpChgYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENC_YN = #{encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = NOW(),
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEST_DATA_CNV_YN = #{testDataCnvYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERS_INFO_CNV_YN = #{persInfoCnvYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERS_INFO_GRD = #{persInfoGrd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update /* WaqSditmMapper.updateByPrimaryKey */ WAQ_SDITM set SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SDITM_LNM = #{sditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SDITM_PNM = #{sditmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LNM_CRI_DS = #{lnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFOTP_ID = #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INFOTP_LNM = #{infotpLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFOTP_CHG_YN = #{infotpChgYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENC_YN = #{encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEST_DATA_CNV_YN = #{testDataCnvYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERS_INFO_CNV_YN = #{persInfoCnvYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERS_INFO_GRD = #{persInfoGrd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.delete:
DELETE A /* WaqSditmMapper.deleteByDmnSnoNoChg */ FROM WAQ_SDITM A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND A.SDITM_LNM = B.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT
AND A.INFOTP_CHG_YN = 'N' AND A.ENC_YN = 'N' AND IFNULL(A.OBJ_DESCN,'_') = IFNULL(B.OBJ_DESCN,'_') AND A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO)
mapper.update:
-- 도메인명은 있고 인포타입이 없을 경우 인포타입 정보를 찾아서 업데이트 한다. UPDATE /* WaqSditmMapper.updateItemInfoType */ WAQ_SDITM X LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.DMN_LNM, A.DMN_PNM, B.INFOTP_LNM, B.DATA_TYPE, B.DATA_LEN, B.DATA_SCAL, C.DMNG_LNM ,A.STND_ASRT FROM WAM_DMN A JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE B ON A.INFOTP_ID = B.INFOTP_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') JOIN WAA_DMNG C ON A.DMNG_ID = C.DMNG_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = C.STND_ASRT AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN C WHERE A.DMN_LNM = C.DMN_LNM AND A.DMN_PNM = C.DMN_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = C.STND_ASRT AND C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND C.VRF_CD = '1' AND C.RQST_DCD = 'CU' ) UNION ALL SELECT DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, INFOTP_LNM, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, DMNG_LNM, STND_ASRT FROM WAQ_DMN A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU'
)A ON X.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND X.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND IFNULL(X.DMN_PNM, '_') = IFNULL(A.DMN_PNM, '_') SET X.INFOTP_LNM = A.INFOTP_LNM ,X.DATA_TYPE = A.DATA_TYPE ,X.DATA_LEN = A.DATA_LEN ,X.DATA_SCAL = A.DATA_SCAL ,X.DMNG_LNM = A.DMNG_LNM WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND X.DMN_LNM IS NOT NULL AND X.INFOTP_LNM IS NULL

-- 도메인명은 있고 인포타입이 없을 경우 인포타입 정보를 찾아서 업데이트 한다. UPDATE /* WaqSditmMapper.updateDataTypeByInfotypLnm */ WAQ_SDITM A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE B ON B.INFOTP_LNM = A.INFOTP_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31','%Y-%m-%d') SET A.DATA_TYPE = B.DATA_TYPE , A.DATA_LEN = B.DATA_LEN , A.DATA_SCAL = B.DATA_SCAL WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.INFOTP_LNM IS NOT NULL

UPDATE /* WaqSditmMapper.updateCheckInit */ WAQ_SDITM A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_SDITM B ON B.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT SET A.REG_TYP_CD = CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN B.SDITM_ID IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END , A.SDITM_ID = B.SDITM_ID , A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
/* WaqSditmMapper.checkRequestDmn */
-- 검증쿼리 : 등록요청 중인 표준항목 존재....(SI012) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_SDITM D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO WHERE E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.SDITM_LNM = D.SDITM_LNM AND A.SDITM_PNM = D.SDITM_PNM and A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND IFNULL(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' )

/* WaqSditmMapper.checkPersInfoGrd */
-- 검증쿼리 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_SDITM D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.SDITM_LNM = D.SDITM_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.PERS_INFO_CNV_YN = 'Y' AND D.PERS_INFO_GRD IS NULL )

/* WaqSditmMapper.checkNotExistSditm */
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SDITM D WHERE A.SDITM_LNM = D.SDITM_LNM AND A.SDITM_PNM = D.SDITM_PNM and A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

/* WaqSditmMapper.checkExistCol */
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_COL D WHERE A.SDITM_ID = D.SDITM_ID)

INSERT /* WaqSditmMapper.checkLnmSymn */ INTO WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS ( BIZ_DTL_CD , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , VRF_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , VRF_DTL_CD , VRF_DTLS ) SELECT #{bizDtlCd} AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,A.RQST_NO ,A.RQST_SNO ,IFNULL(C.VRF_SNO,0) + 1 AS VRF_SNO ,0 AS RQST_DTL_SNO ,#{vrfDtlCd} AS VRF_DTL_CD ,NULL AS VRF_DTLS FROM WAQ_STWD_CNFG A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MAX(VRF_SNO) AS VRF_SNO ,RQST_NO ,RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS A WHERE A.BIZ_DTL_CD = #{bizDtlCd} AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} GROUP BY RQST_NO, RQST_SNO) C ON A.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SYMN D WHERE (A.STWD_LNM = IFNULL(D.SYMN_LNM,'_') AND A.STWD_PNM = IFNULL(D.SYMN_PNM,'_')) and A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U'))

/* WaqSditmMapper.checkExistStwd */
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.LNM_CRI_DS IS NOT NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD_CNFG D WHERE D.BIZ_DTL_CD = 'SDITM' AND A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD E WHERE D.STWD_LNM = E.STWD_LNM AND D.STWD_PNM = E.STWD_PNM and D.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT AND E.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND E.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND E.VRF_CD = '1' UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD E WHERE D.STWD_LNM = E.STWD_LNM AND D.STWD_PNM = E.STWD_PNM and D.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD F WHERE E.STWD_LNM = F.STWD_LNM AND E.STWD_PNM = F.STWD_PNM and E.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT AND F.VRF_CD = '1' AND F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) )

/* WaqSditmMapper.checkDataType */
-- 검증쿼리 : 인포타입별 데이터 타입 체크(SI013) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAA_INFO_TYPE D WHERE D.INFOTP_LNM = A.INFOTP_LNM and D.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND IFNULL(D.DATA_TYPE, '_') = IFNULL(A.DATA_TYPE, '_') AND IFNULL(D.DATA_LEN, 0) = IFNULL(A.DATA_LEN, 0) AND IFNULL(D.DATA_SCAL, 0) = IFNULL(A.DATA_SCAL, 0) )

/* WaqSditmMapper.checkInfoType */
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D INNER JOIN WAA_DMNG_INFOTP_MAP E ON D.DMNG_ID = E.DMNG_ID AND E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE F ON E.INFOTP_ID = F.INFOTP_ID AND F.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.INFOTP_LNM = F.INFOTP_LNM and A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN F WHERE D.DMN_LNM = F.DMN_LNM and D.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT AND F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN D INNER JOIN WAA_DMNG E ON D.DMNG_LNM = E.DMNG_LNM and D.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT AND E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') INNER JOIN WAA_DMNG_INFOTP_MAP F ON E.DMNG_ID = F.DMNG_ID AND F.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE G ON F.INFOTP_ID = G.INFOTP_ID AND G.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM and A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND A.INFOTP_LNM = G.INFOTP_LNM AND D.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' )

/* WaqSditmMapper.checkNotExistDmn */
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN D WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND IFNULL(A.DMN_PNM , '_') = D.DMN_PNM and A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND D.VRF_CD = '1' AND IFNULL(NULLIF(D.SUB_CD_YN,''),'N') = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND IFNULL(A.DMN_PNM , '_') = D.DMN_PNM and A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND IFNULL(NULLIF(D.SUB_CD_YN,''),'N') = 'N' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN E WHERE D.DMN_LNM = E.DMN_LNM and D.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT AND E.VRF_CD = '1' AND E.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IFNULL(NULLIF(E.SUB_CD_YN,''),'N') = 'N' ) )

/* WaqSditmMapper.checkSditmCodeInfoTpChg */
-- 검증쿼리 (SI015) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND A.INFOTP_LNM LIKE '%코드%' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN C INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE D ON D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31','%Y-%m-%d') AND D.INFOTP_ID = C.INFOTP_ID WHERE C.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM and C.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND D.INFOTP_LNM != A.INFOTP_LNM )

/* WaqSditmMapper.checkSditmStwdAsm */
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.SDITM_LNM != CONCAT(REPLACE(A.LNM_CRI_DS,';',''),A.DMN_LNM)

/* WaqSditmMapper.checkDupSditmPnm */
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_SDITM D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.SDITM_LNM != D.SDITM_LNM AND A.SDITM_PNM = D.SDITM_PNM and A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SDITM D WHERE D.SDITM_LNM != A.SDITM_LNM AND D.SDITM_PNM = A.SDITM_PNM and D.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_SDITM F WHERE D.SDITM_LNM = F.SDITM_LNM and D.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT AND F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )

/* WaqSditmMapper.checkSditmPnmMaxLen */
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND LENGTH(A.SDITM_PNM) > 30

/* WaqSditmMapper.checkSditmLnmMaxLen */
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND LENGTH(A.SDITM_LNM) > 30

/* WaqSditmMapper.checkSditmPnmStrNum */
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND CASE WHEN SUBSTR(IFNULL(A.SDITM_PNM,'N'),1,1) BETWEEN '0' AND '9' THEN 'N' ELSE 'C' END = 'N'

/* WaqSditmMapper.checkNotChgData */
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SDITM D INNER JOIN WAM_DMN E ON E.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID AND E.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT INNER JOIN WAA_DMNG G ON G.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND G.DMNG_ID = D.DMNG_ID AND G.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE F ON F.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND F.INFOTP_ID = D.INFOTP_ID AND F.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT WHERE A.SDITM_LNM = D.SDITM_LNM and A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND IFNULL(A.SDITM_PNM , '') = IFNULL(D.SDITM_PNM , '')
AND IFNULL(A.DMN_LNM , '') = IFNULL(E.DMN_LNM , '') AND IFNULL(A.DMNG_LNM , '') = IFNULL(G.DMNG_LNM , '')
AND IFNULL(A.DATA_TYPE , '') = IFNULL(F.DATA_TYPE , '') AND IFNULL(A.DATA_LEN , 99999) = IFNULL(F.DATA_LEN , 99999) AND IFNULL(A.DATA_SCAL , 99999) = IFNULL(F.DATA_SCAL , 99999) -- AND IFNULL(A.ENC_YN , 'N') = IFNULL(D.ENC_YN , 'N') AND IFNULL(A.OBJ_DESCN , '') = IFNULL(D.OBJ_DESCN , '') -- AND IFNULL(A.TEST_DATA_CNV_YN , '_') = IFNULL(TEST_DATA_CNV_YN , '_') )
mapper.update:
UPDATE /* WaqSditmMapper.updatervwStsCd */ WAQ_SDITM
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = NOW() , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND IFNULL(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'

UPDATE /* WaqSditmMapper.updatervwStsCdRejectSwtd */ WAQ_SDITM A
A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' ,A.RVW_CONTS = '포함표준단어반려'
WHERE A.rqst_no = #{rqstNo} AND IFNULL(RVW_STS_CD,99) != '2' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD S INNER JOIN WAQ_STWD_CNFG C on C.STWD_LNM = S.STWD_LNM and C.BIZ_DTL_CD = 'SDITM' and C.STND_ASRT = S.STND_ASRT WHERE S.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND S.RVW_STS_CD = '2' and A.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO )

UPDATE /* WaqSditmMapper.updatervwStsCdRejectDmn */ WAQ_SDITM A
A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' ,A.RVW_CONTS = '포함도메인반려'
WHERE A.rqst_no = #{rqstNo} AND IFNULL(RVW_STS_CD,99) != '2' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RVW_STS_CD = '2' AND A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM and A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT )
mapper.sql: , A.SDITM_LNM, A.SDITM_PNM, A.LNM_CRI_DS, A.DMN_ID, B.DMNG_ID, A.INFOTP_ID, A.INFOTP_CHG_YN, A.ENC_YN , A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID , A.PNM_CRI_DS,A.TRANS_YN,A.TEST_DATA_CNV_YN, A.STND_ASRT

, SDITM_LNM, SDITM_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, DMN_ID, DMNG_ID, INFOTP_ID, INFOTP_CHG_YN, ENC_YN , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID , PNM_CRI_DS,TRANS_YN,TEST_DATA_CNV_YN, STND_ASRT
mapper.select: SELECT /* WaqSditmMapper.selectWaqC */ * FROM WAQ_SDITM WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' -- 승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqSditmMapper.updateWaqCUD */ WAQ_SDITM A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_SDITM B ON B.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') SET A.SDITM_ID = B.SDITM_ID , A.OBJ_VERS = IFNULL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 , A.FRS_RQST_DTM = B.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SDITM B WHERE B.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )

UPDATE /* WaqSditmMapper.updateWaqId */ WAQ_SDITM X LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(B.DMN_ID) AS DMN_ID, MAX(D.DMNG_ID) AS DMNG_ID, MAX(C.INFOTP_ID) AS INFOTP_ID , A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_SDITM A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, DMNG_ID, STND_ASRT FROM WAQ_DMN A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' UNION ALL SELECT DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, DMNG_ID, STND_ASRT FROM WAM_DMN B WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.DMN_LNM = B.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT ) ) B ON B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT INNER JOIN WAA_DMNG D ON D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND D.DMNG_ID = B.DMNG_ID AND D.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT LEFT JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE C ON C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND C.INFOTP_LNM = A.INFOTP_LNM AND C.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT GROUP BY A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO ) A ON A.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO SET X.DMN_ID = A.DMN_ID , X.DMNG_ID = A.DMNG_ID , X.INFOTP_ID = A.INFOTP_ID WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND X.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.delete: DELETE A /* WaqSditmMapper.deleteWAM */ FROM WAM_SDITM A INNER JOIN WAQ_SDITM B ON B.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.update:
-- WAH 이력 만료...
UPDATE /* WaqSditmMapper.updateWAH */ WAH_SDITM A INNER JOIN WAQ_SDITM B ON B.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT SET A.EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.insert: INSERT /* WaqSditmMapper.insertWaqRejected */ INTO WAQ_SDITM( RQST_NO ,RQST_SNO ,SDITM_ID ,SDITM_LNM ,SDITM_PNM ,LNM_CRI_DS ,RQST_DCD ,RVW_STS_CD ,RVW_CONTS ,VRF_RMK ,VRF_CD ,DMN_ID ,DMN_LNM ,INFOTP_ID ,DATA_TYPE ,DATA_LEN ,DATA_SCAL ,INFOTP_LNM ,INFOTP_CHG_YN ,ENC_YN ,OBJ_DESCN ,OBJ_VERS ,REG_TYP_CD ,FRS_RQST_DTM ,FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,RQST_DTM ,RQST_USER_ID ,APRV_DTM ,APRV_USER_ID ,DMNG_ID ,DMNG_LNM ,DMN_PNM ,PNM_CRI_DS ,TEST_DATA_CNV_YN ,STND_ASRT ,PERS_INFO_CNV_YN ,PERS_INFO_GRD ) SELECT #{reqmst.rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,RQST_SNO ,SDITM_ID ,SDITM_LNM ,SDITM_PNM ,LNM_CRI_DS ,RQST_DCD ,'0' ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,DMN_ID ,DMN_LNM ,INFOTP_ID ,DATA_TYPE ,DATA_LEN ,DATA_SCAL ,INFOTP_LNM ,INFOTP_CHG_YN ,ENC_YN ,OBJ_DESCN ,OBJ_VERS ,REG_TYP_CD ,FRS_RQST_DTM ,FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,RQST_DTM ,RQST_USER_ID ,NULL ,NULL ,DMNG_ID ,DMNG_LNM ,DMN_PNM ,PNM_CRI_DS ,TEST_DATA_CNV_YN ,STND_ASRT ,PERS_INFO_CNV_YN ,PERS_INFO_GRD FROM WAQ_SDITM A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{oldRqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '2'
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqSditmMapper.updateWahTransYn */ WAH_SDITM A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAH_SDITM B ON A.SDITM_ID = B.SDITM_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND (A.OBJ_VERS-1) = B.OBJ_VERS AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') SET A.TRANS_YN = IFNULL(B.TRANS_YN, 'N') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d')

UPDATE /* WaqSditmMapper.updateRejSditmByWrd */ WAQ_SDITM A SET RVW_STS_CD = '2' WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD_CNFG B INNER JOIN WAQ_STWD C ON C.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND C.STWD_LNM = B.STWD_LNM AND C.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND C.REG_TYP_CD = 'C' AND C.RVW_STS_CD = '2' WHERE B.BIZ_DTL_CD = 'SDITM' AND B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO )

UPDATE /* WaqSditmMapper.updateSditmDelInfo */ WAQ_SDITM A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT B.SDITM_PNM, B.LNM_CRI_DS, B.DMN_ID, E.DMNG_LNM, C.DMN_LNM, D.INFOTP_LNM , B.DMNG_ID, B.INFOTP_ID, B.INFOTP_CHG_YN, B.ENC_YN, B.OBJ_DESCN , B.FRS_RQST_DTM, B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, B.PNM_CRI_DS, B.TRANS_YN, B.PERS_INFO_CNV_YN, B.PERS_INFO_GRD, B.SDITM_LNM, B.STND_ASRT FROM WAM_SDITM B INNER JOIN WAM_DMN C ON C.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID AND C.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE D ON D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31','%Y-%m-%d') AND D.INFOTP_ID = B.INFOTP_ID AND D.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT INNER JOIN V_WAA_DMNG E ON E.DMNG_ID = B.DMNG_ID AND E.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT ) B ON B.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT SET A.SDITM_PNM = B.SDITM_PNM, A.LNM_CRI_DS = B.LNM_CRI_DS, A.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID, A.DMNG_LNM = B.DMNG_LNM, A.DMN_LNM = B.DMN_LNM, A.INFOTP_LNM = B.INFOTP_LNM, A.DMNG_ID = B.DMNG_ID, A.INFOTP_ID = B.INFOTP_ID, A.INFOTP_CHG_YN = B.INFOTP_CHG_YN, A.ENC_YN = B.ENC_YN, A.OBJ_DESCN = B.OBJ_DESCN, A.FRS_RQST_DTM = B.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.PNM_CRI_DS = B.PNM_CRI_DS, A.TRANS_YN = B.TRANS_YN, A.PERS_INFO_CNV_YN = B.PERS_INFO_CNV_YN, A.PERS_INFO_GRD = B.PERS_INFO_GRD WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'D' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SDITM B WHERE B.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT )

UPDATE /* WaqSditmMapper.updateSditmDelInfoNInfoTp */ WAQ_SDITM A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT B.SDITM_PNM, B.LNM_CRI_DS, B.DMN_ID, E.DMNG_LNM, C.DMN_LNM , B.DMNG_ID, B.ENC_YN, B.OBJ_DESCN , C.DATA_TYPE, C.DATA_LEN, C.DATA_SCAL , B.FRS_RQST_DTM, B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, B.PNM_CRI_DS, B.TRANS_YN, B.PERS_INFO_CNV_YN, B.PERS_INFO_GRD, B.SDITM_LNM, B.STND_ASRT FROM WAM_SDITM B INNER JOIN WAM_DMN C ON C.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID AND C.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT INNER JOIN V_WAA_DMNG E ON E.DMNG_ID = B.DMNG_ID AND E.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT ) B ON B.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT SET A.SDITM_PNM = B.SDITM_PNM, A.LNM_CRI_DS = B.LNM_CRI_DS, A.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID, A.DMNG_LNM = B.DMNG_LNM, A.DMN_LNM = B.DMN_LNM, A.DMNG_ID = B.DMNG_ID, A.DATA_TYPE = B.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN = B.DATA_LEN, A.DATA_SCAL = B.DATA_SCAL, A.ENC_YN = B.ENC_YN, A.OBJ_DESCN = B.OBJ_DESCN, A.FRS_RQST_DTM = B.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.PNM_CRI_DS = B.PNM_CRI_DS, A.TRANS_YN = B.TRANS_YN, A.PERS_INFO_CNV_YN = B.PERS_INFO_CNV_YN, A.PERS_INFO_GRD = B.PERS_INFO_GRD WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'D' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SDITM B WHERE B.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT )
mapper.select: SELECT /* WaqSditmMapper.getUsedTbllist */ A.STND_ASRT ,A.PDM_TBL_LNM ,A.PDM_TBL_PNM ,H.USER_NM AS CRG_USER_NM ,C.SDITM_LNM AS PDM_COL_LNM ,B.PDM_COL_PNM AS PDM_COL_PNM FROM WAM_PDM_TBL A INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL B ON A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND A.PDM_TBL_ID = B.PDM_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAQ_SDITM C ON B.STND_ASRT = C.STND_ASRT AND C.SDITM_ID = B.SDITM_ID AND C.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND C.RQST_NO =#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER H ON A.CRG_USER_ID = H.USER_ID AND H.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND H.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') -- GROUP BY A.STND_ASRT, A.PDM_TBL_LNM, A.PDM_TBL_PNM, H.USER_NM

SELECT /* WaqSditmMapper.selectwamninfolist */ IFNULL((SELECT MAX(X.RQST_SNO) FROM WAQ_SDITM X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{reqmst.rqstNo} ), 0) + @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RQST_SNO , 'I' AS IBS_STATUS , A.SDITM_ID, A.SDITM_LNM, A.SDITM_PNM, A.LNM_CRI_DS, A.PNM_CRI_DS , #{reqmst.rqstDcd} AS RQST_DCD , D.DMNG_LNM , A.DMN_ID, B.DMN_LNM, B.DMN_PNM , A.INFOTP_ID, A.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN, A.DATA_SCAL, A.INFOTP_LNM, A.INFOTP_CHG_YN, A.ENC_YN , A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.TEST_DATA_CNV_YN , A.STND_ASRT, A.PERS_INFO_CNV_YN, A.PERS_INFO_GRD FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP, WAM_SDITM A INNER JOIN WAM_DMN B ON A.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT LEFT JOIN WAA_DMNG D ON D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND D.DMNG_ID = A.DMNG_ID AND D.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT WHERE (A.SDITM_ID,A.STND_ASRT) IN
(#{item.sditmId},#{item.stndAsrt})
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.insert:
/* WaqSditmMapper.checkNotChgDataNInfo */
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SDITM D INNER JOIN WAM_DMN E ON E.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID AND E.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT INNER JOIN WAA_DMNG G ON G.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND G.DMNG_ID = D.DMNG_ID AND G.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT WHERE A.SDITM_LNM = D.SDITM_LNM and A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND IFNULL(A.SDITM_PNM , '') = IFNULL(D.SDITM_PNM , '')
AND IFNULL(A.DMN_LNM , '') = IFNULL(E.DMN_LNM , '') AND IFNULL(A.DMNG_LNM , '') = IFNULL(G.DMNG_LNM , '')
AND IFNULL(A.DATA_TYPE , '') = IFNULL(D.DATA_TYPE , '') AND IFNULL(A.DATA_LEN , 99999) = IFNULL(D.DATA_LEN , 99999) AND IFNULL(A.DATA_SCAL , 99999) = IFNULL(D.DATA_SCAL , 99999) -- AND IFNULL(A.ENC_YN , 'N') = IFNULL(D.ENC_YN , 'N') AND IFNULL(A.OBJ_DESCN , '') = IFNULL(D.OBJ_DESCN , '') -- AND IFNULL(A.TEST_DATA_CNV_YN , '_') = IFNULL(TEST_DATA_CNV_YN , '_') )
mapper.update:
-- 도메인명은 있고 도메인그룹이 없을 경우 도메인그룹 정보를 찾아서 업데이트 한다. UPDATE /* WaqSditmMapper.updateDmng */ WAQ_SDITM X LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.DMN_LNM, A.DMN_PNM, C.DMNG_LNM ,A.STND_ASRT,A.DMNG_ID FROM WAM_DMN A JOIN WAA_DMNG C ON A.DMNG_ID = C.DMNG_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = C.STND_ASRT AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN C WHERE A.DMN_LNM = C.DMN_LNM AND A.DMN_PNM = C.DMN_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = C.STND_ASRT AND C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND C.VRF_CD = '1' AND C.RQST_DCD = 'CU' ) UNION ALL SELECT A.DMN_LNM, A.DMN_PNM, A.DMNG_LNM, A.STND_ASRT, A.DMNG_ID FROM WAQ_DMN A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU'
)A ON X.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND X.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND IFNULL(X.DMN_PNM, '_') = IFNULL(A.DMN_PNM, '_') SET X.DMNG_LNM = A.DMNG_LNM ,X.DMNG_ID = A.DMNG_ID WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND X.DMN_LNM IS NOT NULL AND X.DMNG_LNM IS NULL
mapper.insert:
/* WaqSditmMapper.checkSditmIsFixChg */
-- 검증쿼리 (SI019) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN C INNER JOIN WAA_DMNG D ON D.STND_ASRT = C.STND_ASRT AND D.DMNG_ID = C.DMNG_ID AND D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE C.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM and C.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND C.IS_FIX = '1' AND (IFNULL(C.DATA_TYPE,'') != IFNULL(A.DATA_TYPE,'') OR IFNULL(C.DATA_LEN, 99999) != IFNULL(A.DATA_LEN, 99999) OR IFNULL(C.DATA_SCAL, 99999) != IFNULL(A.DATA_SCAL, 99999) OR IFNULL(D.DMNG_LNM,'') != IFNULL(A.DMNG_LNM,'') ) )
mapper.update: -- 고정도메인인 경우 타입,길이,소수점을 도메인 기준으로 업데이트 UPDATE /* WaqSditmMapper.updateFixDomain */ WAQ_SDITM X INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.DMN_LNM, A.DMN_PNM, C.DMNG_LNM ,A.STND_ASRT, A.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN, A.DATA_SCAL FROM WAM_DMN A JOIN WAA_DMNG C ON A.DMNG_ID = C.DMNG_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = C.STND_ASRT AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.IS_FIX = '1' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN C WHERE A.DMN_LNM = C.DMN_LNM AND A.DMN_PNM = C.DMN_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = C.STND_ASRT AND C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND C.VRF_CD = '1' AND C.RQST_DCD = 'CU' ) UNION ALL SELECT DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, DMNG_LNM, STND_ASRT, A.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN, A.DATA_SCAL FROM WAQ_DMN A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.IS_FIX = '1' AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' )A ON X.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND X.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND IFNULL(X.DMN_PNM, '_') = IFNULL(A.DMN_PNM, '_') SET X.DMNG_LNM = A.DMNG_LNM ,X.DATA_TYPE = A.DATA_TYPE ,X.DATA_LEN = A.DATA_LEN ,X.DATA_SCAL = A.DATA_SCAL WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
mapper.insert:
/* WaqSditmMapper.checkRestrictSitemSuffix */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAA_COMM_DCD CD INNER JOIN WAA_COMM_DTL_CD DC ON CD.COMM_DCD_ID = DC.COMM_DCD_ID AND DC.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND DC.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE CD.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND CD.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND CD.COMM_DCD='RESTRICT_DMN_SUFFIX' AND A.SDITM_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%',DC.COMM_DTL_CD_NM) )
mapper.select:
SELECT S.* FROM WAM_SDITM S LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(OF_DATAELEMENT) AS ENTY_NUM, OF_DATAELEMENT, OBJ_TYPE FROM V_WAM_SDITM_PUS_AOCD WHERE OBJ_TYPE = '10' GROUP BY OF_DATAELEMENT, OBJ_TYPE) D ON S.SDITM_ID = D.OF_DATAELEMENT WHERE 1=1 AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN('C','U') AND NVL(D.ENTY_NUM,0) = 0
AND S.STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (S.SDITM_LNM LIKE '%' || #{sditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR S.SDITM_PNM LIKE '%' || #{sditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%')
AND S.OBJ_DESCN LIKE '%' || #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
ORDER BY S.SDITM_LNM ASC
